DataHubPolicyInfo.description: Information about a DataHub (UI) access policy.

state.description: The state of policy, ACTIVE or INACTIVE

resources.description: The resource that the policy applies to. Not required for some 'Platform' privileges.

privileges.description: The privileges that the policy grants.

actors.description: The actors that the policy applies to.

editable.description: Whether the policy should be editable via the UI

lastUpdatedTimestamp.description: Timestamp when the policy was last updated

DataHubResourceFilter.description: Information used to filter DataHub resource.

type.description:
The type of resource that the policy applies to. This will most often be a data asset entity name, for
example 'dataset'. It is not strictly required because in the future we will want to support filtering a resource
by domain, as well.

resources.description: A specific set of resources to apply the policy to, e.g. asset urns

allResources.description: Whether the policy should be applied to all assets matching the filter.

privilegeConstraints.description: Constraints around what sub-resources operations are allowed to modify, i.e. NOT_EQUALS - cannot modify a particular defined tag, EQUALS - can only modify a particular defined tag, STARTS_WITH - can only modify a tag starting with xyz

PolicyMatchFilter.description: The filter for specifying the resource or actor to apply privileges to

criteria.description: A list of criteria to apply conjunctively (so all criteria must pass)

PolicyMatchCriterion.description: A criterion for matching a field with given value

field.description: The name of the field that the criterion refers to

values.description: Values. Matches criterion if any one of the values matches condition (OR-relationship)

PolicyMatchCondition.description: The matching condition in a filter criterion

DataHubActorFilter.description: Information used to filter DataHub actors.

users.description: A specific set of users to apply the policy to (disjunctive)

groups.description: A specific set of groups to apply the policy to (disjunctive)

resourceOwners.description:
Whether the filter should return true for owners of a particular resource.
Only applies to policies of type 'Metadata', which have a resource associated with them.

resourceOwnersTypes.description: Define type of ownership for the policy

allUsers.description: Whether the filter should apply to all users.

allGroups.description: Whether the filter should apply to all groups.

roles.description: A specific set of roles to apply the policy to (disjunctive).
